title: persian
markdownDescription: The `persian` character filter replaces instances of [zero-width non-joiner](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zero-width_non-joiner) with the space character. This character filter is based on Lucene's [PersianCharFilter](https://lucene.apache.org/core/8_0_0/analyzers-common/org/apache/lucene/analysis/fa/PersianCharFilter.html)

type.markdownDescription: Human-readable label that identifies this character filter type. Value must be `persian`
